text: Lotte Egging (born 8 June 1988) is a Dutch former cricketer. She played in one Test match, twelve One Day Internationals (ODIs) and two Twenty20 (T20Is) matches. She took a hat-trick in an ODI against Pakistan in 2008. ==See also== * List of women's international cricket hat-tricks ==References== Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch expatriates in South Africa Category:Dutch women cricketers Category:Netherlands women One Day International cricketers Category:Netherlands women Test cricketers Category:Netherlands women Twenty20 International cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Nijmegen Category:Women's One Day International cricket hat-trick takers
title: Lotte Egging
